short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Looking for a "Keep me logged in" function in HKU Portal? This is what you need.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
No need to enter UID and PIN every time you login HKU Portal. This extension can even help you login Moodle in one click.

Save your time entering the UID again and again, it sends you directly to your assignment page ;-)

Supported HKU services:
HKU Portal
HKU Moodle
HKU Connect
My Weekly Schedule
IHP Facilities Booking
Library Study Room Booking
UHS Web Appointment Booking
Chi Wah Learning Commons Study Room Booking
